task_description:
Your task is to turn on the electric buzzer by powering it using a renewable power source. First, focus on the electric buzzer. Then, create an electrical circuit that powers it on.
This room is called the hallway. In it, you see:   the agent  a substance called air  a drawing You also see:  A door to the art studio (that is closed)  A door to the bedroom (that is closed)  A door to the greenhouse (that is closed)  A door to the kitchen (that is closed)  A door to the living room (that is closed)  A door to the workshop (that is closed)
